Title: A Matter of Taste
Description:
The disrespect around here!

A couple smelly gorlocs steal bits from our equipment and we have to shut it all doon... Ha! I've been lickin' rocks since before ye were a wee babe! Did nae need nae fancy gnomish gadgetry. 

Bring me a rock, and I'll prove it!
ObjectivesText: Find a rock for Mordigan Ironjaw to lick in Whaler's Nook.
RewardText: Perfect! Prepare to witness the most impressive feat o' geology ye've ever seen!
